creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Full length portrait of a man in long pants, naked from the waist up; he stands facing the viewer with his hands on his hips; the words \"He laughed\" inscribed, UC; washy blue background
marks:

LL: [S.P.]
medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "He Laughed", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
